shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' audio streams.
Unsubscribes from or resumes the audio streams of all remote users.
Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' audio streams.
Unsubscribes from or resumes all remote users' audio streams.

section.p: After successfully calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' audio streams, including users who join the channel after the method is called.
After successfully calling this method, the local user will unsubscribe from or resume all remote users' audio streams, including those who join the channel after this method is called.
After successfully calling this method, the local user will stop or resume subscribing to all remote users' audio streams, including those who join the channel after the method is called.
After successfully calling this method, the local user will unsubscribe from or resume all remote users' audio streams, including those who join the channel after this method is called.

ul.li: This method must be called after .
When using spatial audio, if you need to set whether to subscribe to all remote users' audio streams, it is recommended to call this method instead of 's method.
After calling this method, you need to call and to update the spatial positions of the local and remote users; otherwise, the settings in this method will not take effect.
This method must be called after .
When using spatial audio, to configure whether to subscribe to all remote users' audio streams, it is recommended to call this method instead of the method of .
After calling this method, you need to call and to update the spatial positions of the local and remote users; otherwise, the settings in this method will not take effect.
You must call this method after .
When using spatial audio, to set whether to subscribe to all remote users' audio streams, it is recommended to call this method instead of the method of .
After calling this method, you need to call and to update the spatial positions of the local and remote users; otherwise, the settings in this method will not take effect.
This method must be called after .
When using spatial audio, if you need to control whether to subscribe to all remote users' audio streams, it is recommended to call this method instead of 's method.
After calling this method, you need to call and to update the spatial positions of the local and remote users; otherwise, the settings in this method will not take effect.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop subscribing to all remote users' audio streams:
: Stop subscribing to all remote users' audio streams.
: Subscribe to all remote users' audio streams.

Whether to unsubscribe from all remote users' audio streams:
: Unsubscribe from all remote users' audio streams.
: Subscribe to all remote users' audio streams.

Whether to stop subscribing to all remote users' audio streams:
: Stop subscribing to all remote users' audio streams.
: Subscribe to all remote users' audio streams.

Whether to unsubscribe from all remote users' audio streams:
: Unsubscribe from all remote users' audio streams.
: Subscribe to all remote users' audio streams.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when it fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
